-- creating database

CREATE DATABASE nyc_taxi_db;

USE nyc_taxi_db;

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsecoursedldemo.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]

    -- Checking data types infered by Synapse

    EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''https://synapsecoursedldemo.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '','',
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n''
    ) AS [result]'

-- Reading data with correct data type

SELECT * 
FROM 
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedldemo.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
)
WITH (
    LocationID SMALLINT,
    Borough VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
    Zone VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
    service_zone VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8
)
AS [RESULT];

SELECT NAME, COLLATION_NAME FROM sys.databases;

ALTER DATABASE nyc_taxi_db COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8;

-- select only subset of columns

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsecoursedldemo.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH (
    Borough VARCHAR(15),
    Zone VARCHAR(50)
)
 AS [result]

 -- reading csv file with no header

 SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsecoursedldemo.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH (
    Borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
    Zone VARCHAR(50) 3
)
 AS [result]

 -- create external data source

 CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data
 WITH (
    LOCATION = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedldemo.dfs.core.windows.net/'
 );


 -- reading data using external data source

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH (
    LocationID SMALLINT 1,
    Borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
    Zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
    service_zone VARCHAR(50)
)
 AS [result]

 -- creating data source upto raw container

 CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data_raw
 WITH (
    LOCATION = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedldemo.dfs.core.windows.net/raw'
 );

 -- reading data from raw container using external data source

 
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH (
    LocationID SMALLINT 1,
    Borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
    Zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
    service_zone VARCHAR(50)
)
 AS [result]

SELECT *
FROM 
OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'calendar.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
    FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
)
WITH (
    date_key INT,
    date DATE,
    year SMALLINT,
    month TINYINT,
    day TINYINT,
    day_name VARCHAR(10),
    day_of_year SMALLINT,
    week_of_month TINYINT,
    week_of_year TINYINT,
    month_name VARCHAR(10),
    year_month INT,
    year_week INT
)
AS [RESULT]

USE nyc_taxi_db;

SELECT * FROM 
OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'vendor_unquoted.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION  = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) AS [RESULT]
;

SELECT * FROM 
OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'vendor.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION  = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) AS [RESULT]

USE nyc_taxi_db;

SELECT * FROM 
OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'trip_type.tsv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION  = '2.0',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '\t',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) AS [RESULT]

USE nyc_taxi_db;

SELECT CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsondoc, '$.payment_type') AS SMALLINT) as payment_type,
        CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsondoc, '$.payment_type_desc') AS VARCHAR(15)) as payment_type_desc
 FROM 
OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'payment_type.json',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION  = '1.0',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
)
WITH (
    jsondoc NVARCHAR(max)
) AS [RESULT]

-- using OPENJSON in Synapse

SELECT payment_type,
        description
 FROM 
OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'payment_type.json',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
)
WITH (
    jsondoc NVARCHAR(max)
) AS [RESULT]
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsondoc)
WITH (
    payment_type SMALLINT,
    description VARCHAR(15) '$.payment_type_desc'
)

-- rading array json file

SELECT CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsondoc, '$.payment_type') AS SMALLINT) as payment_type,
        CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsondoc, '$.payment_type_desc[0].value') AS VARCHAR(15)) as payment_type_desc_01,
        CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsondoc, '$.payment_type_desc[1].value') AS VARCHAR(15)) as payment_type_desc_02
 FROM 
OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'payment_type_array.json',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION  = '1.0',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
)
WITH (
    jsondoc NVARCHAR(max)
) AS [RESULT]

-- use openjson to explode json array

SELECT payment_type, payment_type_desc_value
FROM 
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'payment_type_array.json',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION  = '1.0',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
)
WITH (
    jsondoc NVARCHAR(max)
) AS payment_type
CROSS APPLY openjson(jsondoc)
WITH (
    payment_type SMALLINT,
    payment_type_desc NVARCHAR(max) as Json
)
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(payment_type_desc)
WITH (
    sub_type SMALLINT,
    payment_type_desc_value VARCHAR(20) '$.value'
    )

USE nyc_taxi_db;

SELECT rate_code_id, rate_code
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'rate_code.json',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
) 
WITH 
(
    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(max)
) as rate_code
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
WITH(
    rate_code_id SMALLINT,
    rate_code varchar(20)
);

-- process multiline json file

SELECT rate_code_id, rate_code
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'rate_code_multi_line.json',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
) 
WITH 
(
    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(max)
) as rate_code
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
WITH(
    rate_code_id SMALLINT,
    rate_code varchar(20)
);
